reviews.customers_say: Customers like the dress's pretty pattern, comfortable fit that's not tight or clingy, and its suitability for hot weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
items.body: This is much prettier than it looks. Very comfortable and wash in cold water and hang to dry. Comes out perfect. Read more
items.author: maurine mills cantrell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: I love this dress! I live in Florida and this is perfect in the summer and spring. It is lightweight but not too thin. The color blue is so pretty and the fit is flattering. THis was my go to dress all summer for outside activities. Nice quality and great price. I am 5'4" 131lbs. and ordered this in Medium the fit is true to size. Read more
items.author: Kswhitten

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: Nice, lightweight. Very comfortable. I ended up not liking the petal sleeve so I’ll be returning that one. Another has a pattern that doesn’t look great on me (too much big pattern over my big boobs) so I’m returning that one too. I love the sleeveless one I bought so will be getting more. Not too long. Looks good on me Read more
items.author: kh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everywhere dress with pockets
items.body: The dress is great, I’m 5’4 and 170 lbs and it fits perfect. The length is just right and it’s not sheer. I can wear it on vacation or to the grocery store. Love that it has pockets. Read more
items.author: SSS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great summer dress
items.body: I snagged this dress when it was on sale for 13.98 and I am so pleased with it. It is beautiful. Hits just above the knees. I am 5' 7" and 155 lbs. and I purchased a large which fit perfectly. The material is soft and is not see through. The dress is flowy and lady like. It is excellent quality and looks like it cost much more. I receive many compliments when wearing this dress. The dress is machine washable and I hang dry; it comes out beautifully every time. Read more
items.author: Awesome Possum

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute house dress
items.body: Cute print, but the fabric is quite thin. Definitely a very casual dress. There were 2 large patch pockets that distorted the pattern a bit. Luckily they were sewn directly on the fabric, so all I needed was a seam ripper to remove them. After that it's a nice dress Read more
items.author: Yoshilovesfruit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: I was very happy with this dress . The fit is perfect. I love the pattern and the material is light and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Sue Ann Sancho

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple, comfortable summer dress.
items.body: Simple summer dress. Soft stretchy material that wash as well. It is flattering on and the material has a decent thickness. It is wrinkle resistant. The dress runs true to size. You can dress it up or dress it down. Read more
items.author: Irishirish15

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Print 01, Print 02, Print 03, Plain Black, Plain Red, Print 04, Print 09, Plain Blue, Print 05, Print 06, Print 07, Print 08. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
